drug.name: Cycloguanil
drug.description: Cycloguanil is the active metabolite of [proguanil].

classification.description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as aminotriazines. These are organic compounds containing an amino group attached to a triazine ring.

drug-interaction.name: Artemether
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of QTc prolongation can be increased when Cycloguanil is combined with Artemether.

drug-interaction.name: Lumefantrine
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of QTc prolongation can be increased when Cycloguanil is combined with Lumefantrine.

drug-interaction.name: Tetrahydrofolic acid
drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Cycloguanil can be decreased when used in combination with Tetrahydrofolic acid.

drug-interaction.name: Folic acid
drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Cycloguanil can be decreased when used in combination with Folic acid.

drug-interaction.name: Leucovorin
drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Cycloguanil can be decreased when used in combination with Leucovorin.

drug-interaction.name: (6S)-5,6,7,8-tetrahydrofolic acid
drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Cycloguanil can be decreased when used in combination with (6S)-5,6,7,8-tetrahydrofolic acid.

drug-interaction.name: Triglu-5-formyl-tetrahydrofolate
drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Cycloguanil can be decreased when used in combination with Triglu-5-formyl-tetrahydrofolate.
